phrases: I'm having a lot of trouble sleeping... can't get comfortable when I lay down in bed.
I feel I'm just choking a few minutes after I lay down to sleep... can't catch my breath.
This has been going on for about the past two weeks.
Your oxygen level here is ninety-two... a little bit on the low side.
I can't see my ankles anymore... gained about ten pounds.
I don't think I am [taking Lasix regularly].
I'm bringing a whole bunch of yuck up once in a while... first thing in the morning.
I did it a couple of weeks ago [checking blood sugar]... it was about two thirty.
Slight swelling in your neck... mild JVD... rales in both bases... 1.5+ pitting edema in ankles.
Increase Lasix from 20 mg to 60 mg for four days... use albuterol and Atrovent.
Check your weights daily... follow up in a couple of days.
Order another hemoglobin A1c... adjust metformin or add medication.
Prescribe Naprosyn and Flexeril... exercises to get off the couch.
If symptoms don’t improve... we may have to increase the dose or send you to the hospital.
